patthana16.77:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.77:2.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.77:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.77:4.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
